name: Windows to the Sun & Sky
description:
AARI/ Augmented Reality Recognition Image (1355 x727): 

To honor and remember my grandfather (husband, father, pilot, etc.).
This piece was create from a photograph taken of the sun and sky from an airplane in flight, by my grandfather who recently passed away. Priced accordingly: I believe he would have wanted for everyone to be able to experience flying and have a piece of the sky.

Charity: A percentage of proceeds will be donated to WINGS of HOPE (https://wingsofhope.ngo/).

Note: The AARI will be connected to the Augmented Reality scene which will be revealed once all 10,000 editions have been collected.
